tags.name: ef-overlay-menu
tags.description: Overlay that supports single-level and multi-level menus

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True if the menu is currently displayed

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Returns the first selected item value.

attributes.name: no-cancel-on-esc-key
attributes.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay with the ESC key

attributes.name: no-cancel-on-outside-click
attributes.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay by clicking outside it

attributes.name: lock-position-target
attributes.description: Set to true to lock position target

properties.name: data
properties.description:
Construct the menu from data object.
Cannot be used with internal content

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the menu is currently displayed

properties.name: noCancelOnEscKey
properties.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay with the ESC key

properties.name: noCancelOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Set to true to disable canceling the overlay by clicking outside it

properties.name: lockPositionTarget
properties.description: Set to true to lock position target

properties.name: positionTarget
properties.description: Position next to the HTML element

properties.name: value
properties.description: Returns the first selected item value.

events.name: item-trigger
events.description: Dispatched when user clicks on item

events.name: opened-changed
events.description: Dispatched when when opened attribute changes internally. Prevent default to stop opening/closing pipeline
